txt.en: 'The city has taken on several refugees from the crofting lands to the south, as a result of Athelward's decree for evacuation. Many of the same crofters who have helped the marketplace flourish and have granted considerable wealth to the city's nobles are now forced to beg for shelter and food. There have been many accomodations made to help these displaced families, but it has placed a burden on the city and has caused a great deal of panic in the nobles.'
